mapper.update:
update PMS_APP_TRANS_INFO
PAYMENTTYPE = #{paymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADETYPE = #{tradetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADETIME = #{tradetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONENUMBERTYPE = #{phonenumbertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYAMOUNT = #{payamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREPAIDPHONENUMBER = #{prepaidphonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKCARDNAME = #{bankcardname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCNAME = #{mercname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKNAME = #{bankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHORTBANKCARDNUMBER = #{shortbankcardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYEENAME = #{payeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REASONOFPAYMENT = #{reasonofpayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREPAIDCOMEONCARDCOMPANY = #{prepaidcomeoncardcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMEONKAKA = #{comeonkaka,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCID = #{mercid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POUNDAGE = #{poundage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FACTAMOUNT = #{factamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESPONSESTATE = #{responsestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENTCODE = #{paymentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADETYPECODE = #{tradetypecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKNO = #{bankno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREDITCARDNUMBER = #{creditcardnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PORTORDERID = #{portorderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINISHTIME = #{finishtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERAMOUNT = #{orderamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RATE = #{rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESULT_CODE = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRAW_MONEY_TYPE = #{drawMoneyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THIRD_PART_RESULT_CODE = #{thirdPartResultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERSONAL_PAY = #{personalPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRUSHTYPE = #{brushType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SNNO = #{snNO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNTINGFLAG = #{accountingFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERIALNO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSNUM = #{businessNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNELNUM = #{channelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEARCHNUM = #{searchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OAGENTNO = #{oAgentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHPATH = #{authPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ALTLAT = #{altLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gpsAddress = #{gpsAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update PMS_APP_TRANS_INFO set PAYMENTTYPE = #{paymenttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADETYPE = #{tradetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADETIME = #{tradetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONENUMBERTYPE = #{phonenumbertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYAMOUNT = #{payamount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PREPAIDPHONENUMBER = #{prepaidphonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{drawMoneyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THIRD_PART_RESULT_CODE = #{thirdPartResultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSONAL_PAY = #{personalPay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRUSHTYPE = #{businessNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNELNUM = #{channelNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEARCHNUM = #{searchNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OAGENTNO = #{oAgentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AUTHPATH = #{authPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR, ALTLAT = #{altLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gpsAddress = #{gpsAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
from PMS_APP_TRANS_INFO t where t.MERCID = #{mercId} and t.TRADETYPECODE = #{businessCode} and t.bankno = #{bankCardNumber} and t.tradetime between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and t.STATUS!=3 order by t.id desc

select
from PMS_APP_TRANS_INFO t where to_char(to_date(t.tradetime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm-dd')=to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and TO_NUMBER(sysdate - to_date(t.tradetime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))* 24 * 60 > 5 and t.status in (200,2,4,5)
update PMS_APP_TRANS_INFO set ACCOUNTINGFLAG = '1' where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from (select * from (select substr(t.finishtime, 0, 7) as timestr,substr(t.tradetime, 0,7) as timestrtrade, sum(t.factamount) as amountsum, sum(t.poundage) as poundagesum from pms_app_trans_info t where t.status = '0' and t.tradetypecode='7' and t.mercid = #{mercid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by substr(t.finishtime, 0, 7), substr(t.tradetime, 0,7)) order by timestr desc) where rownum <= 12
mapper.update: update PMS_APP_TRANS_INFO set STATUS = '6' where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from pms_app_trans_info t where t.mercid = #{mercId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and substr(t.tradetime, 0, 10) = #{tradeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from PMS_APP_TRANS_INFO p where p.mercid in (select obj.merc_id from POSP_ROUTE_INFO m join PMS_BUSINESS_INFO t on t.id = m.merchant_id join PMS_MERCHANT_INFO obj on obj.id = m.owner_id where t.business_num in ('928000000017051') and m.status='1') and p.status in('200','2') and p.tradetime between TO_CHAR(sysdate-100/1440, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') order by p.tradetime asc

select p.* ,o.userid settlepoundage,o.verifyid totalpoundage from PMS_APP_TRANS_INFO p join ORIGINAL_ORDER_INFO o on o.order_id=p.orderid where p.mercid in (select obj.merc_id from POSP_ROUTE_INFO m join PMS_BUSINESS_INFO t on t.id = m.merchant_id join PMS_MERCHANT_INFO obj on obj.id = m.owner_id where t.business_num in ('10000173') and m.status='1') and p.status in('200','2')
order by p.tradetime asc
